          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>

       <div id="wrapbox20626419">

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626419">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626419">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20626419" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20626420">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626420">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626420">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Wikipedia Criteria of Reliability
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content20626420">
          <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19568569">
           <div id="boxatt19568569" class="boxatt">
            <div class="itemlist">
             <ul>
              <li id="link22887693">
               <a id="link_22887693" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Verifiability#Reliable_sources" target="_blank">
                Wikipedia: Reliable sources
               </a>
               <div class="linkdesc">
                Defines "reliability" of sources per Wikipedia.
               </div>
              </li>
              <li id="link22887744">
               <a id="link_22887744" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources#Scholarship" target="_blank">
                Wikipedia: Scholarship
               </a>
               <div class="linkdesc">
                Defines "scholarship," or scholarly sources, per Wikipedia.
               </div>
              </li>
             </ul>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div id="boxatt20626420" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20626421">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626421">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626421">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference Works to Narrow Topics and Recommend Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626421">
          <div id="boxatt20626421" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24076481">
              <a id="link_24076481" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24076481,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066420">
              <a id="link_24066420" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BSX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066420,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716850}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Published by an academic press.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066424">
              <a id="link_24066424" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066424,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">

              </div>

           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626422">
          <div id="boxatt20626422" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24076489">
              <a id="link_24076489" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24076489,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20626423">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626423">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626423">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Periodical articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626423">
          <div id="boxatt20626423" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24066427">
              <a id="link_24066427" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066427,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066430">
              <a id="link_24066430" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066430,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A subscription database. Standard index for religious studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066431">
              <a id="link_24066431" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066431,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066428">
              <a id="link_24066428" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066428,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24066429">
              <a id="link_24066429" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24066429,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Religions and the Meaning of Life/Jesus Meets Krishna', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343609}); ">
               Project Muse
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Recent archive of journals from a number of academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>

     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5504581" class="profile_wrapper">

      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20626426">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626426">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626426">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626426">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           for
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            samples
           </a>
           of annotations using APA, MLA, and Chicago styles.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20626426" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20626427">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20626427">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20626427">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20626427">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20626427" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
